short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scans the page for any contact information and lets you quickly paste it or open the links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you find yourself manually collecting contact details from websites and feeling drained at the end of the day? Sales Web Scraper automates that entire process, freeing you up to do what you do bestâ€”close deals.

Ok, maybe that's a stretch for what it does. It helps you copy contact data from a web page. You can also click and open any link to social media like Twitter, Facebook or LinkedIn. It makes it fast to find follow and get in touch with the comany you're trying to reach out to.
